title: Whiskey and Country
description: USA Today Bestselling author Emmanuelle Snow brings you a story that will imprint your heart forever.I pushed the button. I ended a friendship. Now I’m haunted by the images from that night. And I have no idea how to heal the part of my heart that is fractured.My friend was wise beyond his age, he knew me more than I knew myself. The career, the money, the promotion, they all seem futile now. I’m stuck with no idea how to turn my life around. Until I receive a package that opens my eyes to new possibilities. And dreams I never thought I should reach for.The journey has one endgame: find happiness again and my place in this world.After driving for weeks, I end up in Green Mountain, a small town in Tennessee, a far cry from my hometown of Chicago.And then I meet her. Dahlia Ellis. My soulmate. My other half. My true purpose.Even in my wildest dreams, I would never have thought that she was where I was supposed to be.Will the bond we share from the first time our eyes locked enough to seal our destiny, or will the ghosts from our past get in the way?Other books in the Carter Hills Band Series:Pink and CountryPrincess and CountryWhiskey and CountryHope and CountryStars and CountrySon and Country
author: Emmanuelle Snow
